name: Senor Pink
text: On Play DON!! -1: Add up to 1 purple Event card with a cost of 5 or less from your trash to your hand. Then, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active.

effect.text: Add up to 1 purple Event card with a cost of 5 or less from your trash to your hand. Then, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and has 'SPECIAL' rarity indicator, but rarity is confirmed as 'SP' from printed text. Power value is 6000, which is also shown in the counter box.
